original_text: And Jacob their father said unto them, Me have ye bereaved of my children: Joseph is not, and Simeon is not, and ye will take Benjamin away: all these things are against me.
korean_text: 그들의 아버지 야곱이 그들에게 이르되 너희가 나에게 내 자식들을 잃게 하도다 요셉도 없어졌고 시므온도 없어졌거늘 베냐민을 또 빼앗아 가고자 하니 이는 다 나를 해롭게 함이로다

sentences.original_text: And Jacob their father said unto them
Me have ye bereaved of my children
and ye will take Benjamin away
all these things are against me
